availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John M. Henderson (Lykins County, Kansas; Kentucky native)

body.p: Lykins County, Kansas farmer. Kentucky native. Married Sarah F. Crewdson Henderson in 1855.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Logan County, District 1, p. 36. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kansas, Lykins County, Middle Creek, p. 106. Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records – Microfilm (1852-1910), Microfilm rolls #994027-994058, Logan County, 1855, Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives, Frankfort, Kentucky. “John Monroe Henderson,” Find A Grave, memorial no. 94581774 (accessed May 28, 2017).
